021import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
022import net.tnemc.core.command.parameters.PercentBigDecimal;
023import net.tnemc.core.command.parameters.resolver.annotation.AllSupport;
024import net.tnemc.core.command.parameters.resolver.annotation.EnderSupport;
025import net.tnemc.core.command.parameters.resolver.annotation.InventorySupport;
026import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
027import net.tnemc.core.currency.parser.ParseMoney;
028import net.tnemc.plugincore.sponge.impl.SpongeCMDSource;
029import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Command;
030import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Default;
031import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Description;
032import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Named;
033import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Subcommand;
034import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Usage;
035import revxrsal.commands.sponge.actor.SpongeCommandActor;
036import revxrsal.commands.sponge.annotation.CommandPermission;
037
038import static net.tnemc.core.TNECore.DEFAULT_WORLD;
039
040/**
041 * MoneyCommands
042 *
043 * @author creatorfromhell
044 * @since 0.1.2.0
045 */
046@Command({ "money", "eco", "mybal" })
047public class MoneyCommand {
048
049  //@DefaultFor({ "mybal" })
050  @Subcommand({ "balmenu", "menu", "mybal" })
051  @Usage("Money.MyBal.Arguments")
052  @Description("Money.MyBal.Description")
053  @CommandPermission("tne.money.mybal")
054  public void onMyBal(final SpongeCommandActor sender) {
055
056    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onMyBal(new SpongeCMDSource(sender));
057  }
058
059  //@DefaultFor({ "bal", "money", "eco", "balance" })
060  @Subcommand({ "balance", "bal", "val" })
061  @Usage("Money.Balance.Arguments")
062  @Description("Money.Balance.Description")
063  @CommandPermission("tne.money.balance")
064  public void onBalance(final SpongeCommandActor sender, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default(DEFAULT_WORLD) @Named("region") final String region) {
065
066    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onBalance(new SpongeCMDSource(sender), currency, region);
067  }
068
069  @Subcommand({ "convert" })
070  @Usage("Money.Convert.Arguments")
071  @Description("Money.Convert.Description")
072  @CommandPermission("tne.money.convert")
073  public void onConvert(final SpongeCommandActor sender, @Named("amount") final PercentBigDecimal amount, @Named("currency") final Currency currency, final Currency fromCurrency) {
074
075    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onConvert(new SpongeCMDSource(sender), amount, currency, fromCurrency);
076  }
077
078  @Subcommand({ "deposit" })
079  @Usage("Money.Deposit.Arguments")
080  @Description("Money.Deposit.Description")
081  @CommandPermission("tne.money.deposit")
082  @InventorySupport
083  @EnderSupport
084  @AllSupport
085  public void onDeposit(final SpongeCommandActor sender, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default(DEFAULT_WORLD) @Named("region") final String region) {
086
087    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onDeposit(new SpongeCMDSource(sender), amount, currency, region);
088  }
089
090  @Subcommand({ "give", "+", "add" })
091  @Usage("Money.Give.Arguments")
092  @Description("Money.Give.Description")
093  @CommandPermission("tne.money.give")
094  public void onGive(final SpongeCommandActor sender, final Account player, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney parseMoney, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default(DEFAULT_WORLD) @Named("region") final String region) {
095
096    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onGive(new SpongeCMDSource(sender), player, parseMoney, currency, region);
097  }
098
099  @Subcommand({ "giveall", "+a", "addall" })
100  @Usage("Money.GiveAll.Arguments")
101  @Description("Money.GiveAll.Description")
102  @CommandPermission("tne.money.giveall")
103  public void onGiveAll(final SpongeCommandActor sender, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default(DEFAULT_WORLD) @Named("region") final String region) {
104
105    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onGiveAll(new SpongeCMDSource(sender), amount, currency, region);
106  }
107
108  @Subcommand({ "givenote", "+note", "addnote" })
109  @Usage("Money.GiveNote.Arguments")
110  @Description("Money.GiveNote.Description")
111  @CommandPermission("tne.money.givenote")
112  public void onGiveNote(final SpongeCommandActor sender, final Account player, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency) {
113
114    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onGiveNote(new SpongeCMDSource(sender), player, amount, currency);
115  }
116
117  @Subcommand({ "note", "n" })
118  @Usage("Money.Note.Arguments")
119  @Description("Money.Note.Description")
120  @CommandPermission("tne.money.note")
121  @InventorySupport
122  @EnderSupport
123  @AllSupport
124  public void onNote(final SpongeCommandActor sender, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency) {
125
126    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onNote(new SpongeCMDSource(sender), amount, currency);
127  }
128
129  @Subcommand({ "other", "check", "balo" })
130  //@DefaultFor({ "balo", "balanceother" })
131  @Usage("Money.Other.Arguments")
132  @Description("Money.Other.Description")
133  @CommandPermission("tne.money.other")
134  public void onOther(final SpongeCommandActor sender, final Account player, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default(DEFAULT_WORLD) @Named("region") final String region) {
135
136    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onOther(new SpongeCMDSource(sender), player, currency, region);
137  }
138
139  @Subcommand({ "pay", "send", "transfer" })
140  @Usage("Money.Pay.Arguments")
141  @Description("Money.Pay.Description")
142  @CommandPermission("tne.money.pay")
143  @InventorySupport
144  @EnderSupport
145  @AllSupport
146  public void onPay(final SpongeCommandActor sender, final Account player, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency) {
147
148    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onPay(new SpongeCMDSource(sender), player, amount, currency);
149  }
150
151  @Subcommand({ "request" })
152  @Usage("Money.Request.Arguments")
153  @Description("Money.Request.Description")
154  @CommandPermission("tne.money.Request")
155  public void onRequest(final SpongeCommandActor sender, final Account player, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency) {
156
157    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onRequest(new SpongeCMDSource(sender), player, amount, currency);
158  }
159
160  @Subcommand({ "set", "eq", "=" })
161  @Usage("Money.Set.Arguments")
162  @Description("Money.Set.Description")
163  @CommandPermission("tne.money.set")
164  public void onSet(final SpongeCommandActor sender, final Account player, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default(DEFAULT_WORLD) @Named("region") final String region) {
165
166    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onSet(new SpongeCMDSource(sender), player, amount, currency, region);
167  }
168
169  @Subcommand({ "setall" })
170  @Usage("Money.SetAll.Arguments")
171  @Description("Money.SetAll.Description")
172  @CommandPermission("tne.money.setall")
173  public void onSetAll(final SpongeCommandActor sender, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default(DEFAULT_WORLD) @Named("region") final String region) {
174
175    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onSetAll(new SpongeCMDSource(sender), amount, currency, region);
176  }
177
178  @Subcommand({ "switch", "swap" })
179  @Usage("Money.Switch.Arguments")
180  @Description("Money.Switch.Description")
181  @CommandPermission("tne.money.switch")
182  public void onSwitch(final SpongeCommandActor sender, @Named("switched") final Account account) {
183
184    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onSwitch(new SpongeCMDSource(sender), account);
185  }
186
187  @Subcommand({ "take", "minus", "remove", "-" })
188  @Usage("Money.Take.Arguments")
189  @Description("Money.Take.Description")
190  @CommandPermission("tne.money.take")
191  @InventorySupport
192  @EnderSupport
193  @AllSupport
194  public void onTake(final SpongeCommandActor sender, final Account player, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default(DEFAULT_WORLD) @Named("region") final String region) {
195
196    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onTake(new SpongeCMDSource(sender), player, amount, currency, region);
197  }
198
199  @Subcommand({ "top", "baltop" })
200  @Usage("Money.Top.Arguments")
201  @Description("Money.Top.Description")
202  @CommandPermission("tne.money.top")
203  public void onTop(final SpongeCommandActor sender, final Integer page, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default("false") final Boolean refresh) {
204
205    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onTop(new SpongeCMDSource(sender), page, currency, refresh);
206  }
207
208  @Subcommand({ "withdraw" })
209  @Usage("Money.Withdraw.Arguments")
210  @Description("Money.Withdraw.Description")
211  @CommandPermission("tne.money.withdraw")
212  @AllSupport
213  public void onWithdraw(final SpongeCommandActor sender, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("") @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Default(DEFAULT_WORLD) @Named("region") final String region) {
214
215    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onWithdraw(new SpongeCMDSource(sender), amount, currency, region);
216  }
217}
